cvardefs.name: kGroupTypeParaBox
cvardefs.desc: group of paragraphs belonging to text box

cvardefs.name: kGroupTypeParaCell
cvardefs.desc: group of paragraphs belonging to table cell

cvardefs.name: kGroupTypeParaMain
cvardefs.desc: group of paragraphs belonging to main document

ivardefs.name: ivBuffer
ivardefs.desc: buffer for accumulating text destined for output

ivardefs.name: ivBufferWriteFormat
ivardefs.desc: any output is written to file using the specified format

ivardefs.name: ivIsMemoryOutput
ivardefs.desc: if true, output is directed to ivMemoryOutput instead of a file on disk

ivardefs.name: ivMemoryOutput
ivardefs.desc: if ivIsMemoryOutput is true, all output is added to this

properties.desc: OWrite: For exporting OWrite data to other formats implemented by developer CHANGE_2013_11_27_1 (requires OWrite version 3.5.0)
